de.griefed.serverpackcreator.swing

Class TabCreateServerPack

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • de.griefed.serverpackcreator.swing.TabCreateServerPack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class TabCreateServerPack
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    This class creates the tab which displays the labels, textfields, buttons and functions in order to create a new server pack. Available are:
    JLabels and JTextFields for modpackDir, clientMods, copyDirs, javaPath, minecraftVersion, modLoader, modLoaderVersion
    Checkboxes for Include- serverInstallation, serverIcon, serverProperties, startScripts, ZIP-archive
    Buttons opening the file explorer and choosing: modpackDir, clientMods, copyDirs, javaPath, loadConfigFromFile
    A button for displaying an information windows which provides detailed explanation of the important parts of the GUI.
    The button start the generation of a new server pack.
    The label under the button to start the generation of a new server pack, which displays the latest log entry of the serverpackcreator.log during the creation of a new server pack.
    If a configuration file is found during startup of ServerPackCreator, it is automatically loaded into the GUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TabCreateServerPack

        public TabCreateServerPack(LocalizationManager injectedLocalizationManager,
                           ConfigurationHandler injectedConfigurationHandler,
                           CurseCreateModpack injectedCurseCreateModpack,
                           ServerPackHandler injectedServerPackHandler,
                           AddonsHandler injectedAddonsHandler,
                           VersionLister injectedVersionLister,
                           ApplicationProperties injectedApplicationProperties,
                           javax.swing.JFrame injectedServerPackCreatorFrame)
        Constructor

        Used for Dependency Injection.

        Receives an instance of LocalizationManager or creates one if the received one is null. Required for use of localization.

        Receives an instance of ConfigurationHandler required to successfully and correctly create the server pack.

        Receives an instance of CurseCreateModpack in case the modpack has to be created from a combination of CurseForge projectID and fileID, from which to then create the server pack. Receives an instance of ServerPackHandler which is required to generate a server pack.

        Parameters:
        injectedLocalizationManager - Instance of LocalizationManager required for localized log messages.
        injectedConfigurationHandler - Instance of ConfigurationHandler required to successfully and correctly create the server pack.
        injectedCurseCreateModpack - Instance of CurseCreateModpack in case the modpack has to be created from a combination of CurseForge projectID and fileID, from which to then create the server pack.
        injectedServerPackHandler - Instance of ServerPackHandler required for the generation of server packs.
        injectedAddonsHandler - Instance of AddonsHandler required for accessing installed addons, if any exist.
        injectedVersionLister - Instance of VersionLister required for setting/changing comboboxes.
        injectedApplicationProperties - Instance of Properties required for various different things.
        injectedServerPackCreatorFrame - Our parent frame which contains all of ServerPackCreator.

      • createServerPackTab

        public javax.swing.JComponent createServerPackTab()
        Create the tab which displays every component related to configuring ServerPackCreator and creating a server pack.
        Returns:
        JComponent. Returns a JPanel everything needed for displaying the TabCreateServerPack.

      • actionEventCheckBoxServer

        private void actionEventCheckBoxServer(java.awt.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Checks whether the checkbox for the modloader-server installation is selected and whether the path to the Java-installation is defined. If true and empty, a message is displayed, warning the user that Javapath needs to be defined for the modloader-server installation to work. If "Yes" is clicked, a filechooser will open where the user can select their Java-executable/binary. If "No" is selected, the user is warned about the consequences of not setting the Javapath.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - The event which triggers this method.

      • addMouseListenerContentAreaFilledToButton

        private void addMouseListenerContentAreaFilledToButton(javax.swing.JButton buttonToAddMouseListenerTo)
        Adds a mouse listener to the passed button which sets the content area of said button filled|not-filled when the mouse enters|leaves the button.
        Parameters:
        buttonToAddMouseListenerTo - JButton. The button to add the mouse listener to.

      • selectClientMods

        private void selectClientMods(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Upon button-press, open a file-selector for clientside-only mods. If the modpack-directory is specified, the file-selector will open in the mods-directory in the modpack-directory.
        Parameters:
        event - The event which triggers this method.

      • selectCopyDirs

        private void selectCopyDirs(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Upon button-press, open a file-selector for directories which are to be copied to the server pack. If the modpack-directory is specified, the file-selector will be opened in the modpack-directory.
        Parameters:
        event - The event which triggers this method.

      • selectJavaInstallation

        private void selectJavaInstallation(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Upon button-press, open a file-selector to select the Java-executable.
        Parameters:
        event - The event which triggers this method.

      • chooseJava

        void chooseJava()
        Opens a filechooser to select the Java-executable/binary.

      • generateServerpack

        private void generateServerpack(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Upon button-press, check the entered configuration and if successfull, generate a server pack.
        Parameters:
        event - The event which triggers this method.

      • saveConfig

        void saveConfig(java.io.File configFile,
                boolean temporary)
        Save the current configuration to a specified file.
        Parameters:
        configFile - File. The file to store the configuration under.
        temporary - Whether the file is temporary. Determines whether the config in the basedir is deleted first.

      • loadConfig

        protected void loadConfig(java.io.File configFile)
        When the GUI has finished loading, try and load the existing serverpackcreator.conf-file into ServerPackCreator.
        Parameters:
        configFile - File. The configuration file to parse and load into the GUI.

      • updateModloaderGuiComponents

        private void updateModloaderGuiComponents(boolean fabric,
                                          boolean forge,
                                          java.lang.String chosenModloader)
        Helper method which changes various states of GUI components.
        Parameters:
        fabric - Boolean. Whether Fabric is active.
        forge - Boolean. Whether Forge is active.
        chosenModloader - String. The modloader to set.

      • clearInterface

        protected void clearInterface()
        Load default values for textfields so the user can start with a new configuration. Just as if ServerPackCreator was started without a serverpackcreator.conf being present.
